data.textUthmani: قٓ ۚ وَٱلْقُرْءَانِ ٱلْمَجِيدِ
data.wordByWord: قٓ ۚ [Qaf] وَٱلْقُرْءَانِ [By the Quran] ٱلْمَجِيدِ [the Glorious]
data.transliteration: Qaf walqur-ani almajeed

data.textUthmani: بَلْ عَجِبُوٓا۟ أَن جَآءَهُم مُّنذِرٌ مِّنْهُمْ فَقَالَ ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ هَـٰذَا شَىْءٌ عَجِيبٌ
data.wordByWord: بَلْ [Nay] عَجِبُوٓا۟ [they wonder] أَن [that] جَآءَهُم [has come to them] مُّنذِرٌۭ [a warner] مِّنْهُمْ [from them] فَقَالَ [So say] ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ [the disbelievers] هَـٰذَا [This] شَىْءٌ [(is) a thing] عَجِيبٌ [amazing]
data.transliteration: Bal AAajiboo an jaahum munthirunminhum faqala alkafiroona hatha shay-onAAajeeb

data.textUthmani: أَءِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابًا ۖ ذَٰلِكَ رَجْعٌۢ بَعِيدٌ
data.wordByWord: أَءِذَا [What! When] مِتْنَا [we die] وَكُنَّا [and have become] تُرَابًۭا ۖ [dust] ذَٰلِكَ [That] رَجْعٌۢ [(is) a return] بَعِيدٌۭ [far]
data.transliteration: A-itha mitna wakunna turabanthalika rajAAun baAAeed

data.textUthmani: قَدْ عَلِمْنَا مَا تَنقُصُ ٱلْأَرْضُ مِنْهُمْ ۖ وَعِندَنَا كِتَـٰبٌ حَفِيظٌۢ
data.wordByWord: قَدْ [Certainly] عَلِمْنَا [We know] مَا [what] تَنقُصُ [diminishes] ٱلْأَرْضُ [the earth] مِنْهُمْ ۖ [of them] وَعِندَنَا [and with Us] كِتَـٰبٌ [(is) a Book] حَفِيظٌۢ [guarded]
data.transliteration: Qad AAalimna ma tanqusual-ardu minhum waAAindana kitabun hafeeth

data.textUthmani: بَلْ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِٱلْحَقِّ لَمَّا جَآءَهُمْ فَهُمْ فِىٓ أَمْرٍ مَّرِيجٍ
data.wordByWord: بَلْ [Nay] كَذَّبُوا۟ [they denied] بِٱلْحَقِّ [the truth] لَمَّا [when] جَآءَهُمْ [it came (to) them] فَهُمْ [so they] فِىٓ [(are) in] أَمْرٍۢ [a state] مَّرِيجٍ [confused]
data.transliteration: Bal kaththaboo bilhaqqilamma jaahum fahum fee amrin mareej

data.textUthmani: أَفَلَمْ يَنظُرُوٓا۟ إِلَى ٱلسَّمَآءِ فَوْقَهُمْ كَيْفَ بَنَيْنَـٰهَا وَزَيَّنَّـٰهَا وَمَا لَهَا مِن فُرُوجٍ
data.wordByWord: أَفَلَمْ [Then do not] يَنظُرُوٓا۟ [they look] إِلَى [at] ٱلسَّمَآءِ [the sky] فَوْقَهُمْ [above them ] كَيْفَ [how] بَنَيْنَـٰهَا [We structured it] وَزَيَّنَّـٰهَا [and adorned it] وَمَا [and not] لَهَا [for it] مِن [any] فُرُوجٍۢ [rifts]
data.transliteration: Afalam yanthuroo ila assama-ifawqahum kayfa banaynaha wazayyannahawama laha min furooj

data.textUthmani: وَٱلْأَرْضَ مَدَدْنَـٰهَا وَأَلْقَيْنَا فِيهَا رَوَٰسِىَ وَأَنۢبَتْنَا فِيهَا مِن كُلِّ زَوْجٍۭ بَهِيجٍ
data.wordByWord: وَٱلْأَرْضَ [And the earth] مَدَدْنَـٰهَا [We have spread it out] وَأَلْقَيْنَا [and cast] فِيهَا [therein] رَوَٰسِىَ [firmly set mountains] وَأَنۢبَتْنَا [and We made to grow] فِيهَا [therein] مِن [of] كُلِّ [every] زَوْجٍۭ [kind] بَهِيجٍۢ [beautiful]
data.transliteration: Wal-arda madadnahawaalqayna feeha rawasiya waanbatnafeeha min kulli zawjin baheej

data.textUthmani: تَبْصِرَةً وَذِكْرَىٰ لِكُلِّ عَبْدٍ مُّنِيبٍ
data.wordByWord: تَبْصِرَةًۭ [Giving insight] وَذِكْرَىٰ [and a reminder] لِكُلِّ [for every] عَبْدٍۢ [slave] مُّنِيبٍۢ [who turns]
data.transliteration: Tabsiratan wathikralikulli AAabdin muneeb

data.textUthmani: وَنَزَّلْنَا مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءً مُّبَـٰرَكًا فَأَنۢبَتْنَا بِهِۦ جَنَّـٰتٍ وَحَبَّ ٱلْحَصِيدِ
data.wordByWord: وَنَزَّلْنَا [And We have sent down] مِنَ [from] ٱلسَّمَآءِ [the sky] مَآءًۭ [water] مُّبَـٰرَكًۭا [blessed] فَأَنۢبَتْنَا [then We made to grow] بِهِۦ [thereby] جَنَّـٰتٍۢ [gardens] وَحَبَّ [and grain] ٱلْحَصِيدِ [(for) the harvest]
data.transliteration: Wanazzalna mina assama-imaan mubarakan faanbatna bihi jannatinwahabba alhaseed

data.textUthmani: وَٱلنَّخْلَ بَاسِقَـٰتٍ لَّهَا طَلْعٌ نَّضِيدٌ
data.wordByWord: وَٱلنَّخْلَ [And the palms trees] بَاسِقَـٰتٍۢ [tall ] لَّهَا [for it] طَلْعٌۭ [(are) layers] نَّضِيدٌۭ [arranged]
data.transliteration: Wannakhla basiqatinlaha talAAun nadeed

data.textUthmani: رِّزْقًا لِّلْعِبَادِ ۖ وَأَحْيَيْنَا بِهِۦ بَلْدَةً مَّيْتًا ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ ٱلْخُرُوجُ
data.wordByWord: رِّزْقًۭا [A provision] لِّلْعِبَادِ ۖ [for the slaves] وَأَحْيَيْنَا [and We give life] بِهِۦ [therewith] بَلْدَةًۭ [(to) a land] مَّيْتًۭا ۚ [dead] كَذَٰلِكَ [Thus] ٱلْخُرُوجُ [(will be) the coming forth]
data.transliteration: Rizqan lilAAibadi waahyaynabihi baldatan maytan kathalika alkhurooj

data.textUthmani: كَذَّبَتْ قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمُ نُوحٍ وَأَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلرَّسِّ وَثَمُودُ
data.wordByWord: كَذَّبَتْ [Denied] قَبْلَهُمْ [before them] قَوْمُ [(the) people] نُوحٍۢ [(of) Nuh] وَأَصْحَـٰبُ [and (the) companions] ٱلرَّسِّ [(of) Ar-Raas] وَثَمُودُ [and Thamud]
data.transliteration: Kaththabat qablahum qawmu noohinwaas-habu arrassi wathamood

data.textUthmani: وَعَادٌ وَفِرْعَوْنُ وَإِخْوَٰنُ لُوطٍ
data.wordByWord: وَعَادٌۭ [And Aad] وَفِرْعَوْنُ [and Firaun] وَإِخْوَٰنُ [and (the) brothers] لُوطٍۢ [(of) Lut]
data.transliteration: WaAAadun wafirAAawnu wa-ikhwanuloot

data.textUthmani: وَأَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلْأَيْكَةِ وَقَوْمُ تُبَّعٍ ۚ كُلٌّ كَذَّبَ ٱلرُّسُلَ فَحَقَّ وَعِيدِ
data.wordByWord: وَأَصْحَـٰبُ [And (the) companions] ٱلْأَيْكَةِ [(of) the wood] وَقَوْمُ [and (the) people] تُبَّعٍۢ ۚ [(of) Tubba] كُلٌّۭ [All] كَذَّبَ [denied] ٱلرُّسُلَ [the Messengers] فَحَقَّ [so was fulfilled] وَعِيدِ [My Threat]
data.transliteration: Waas-habu al-aykati waqawmutubbaAAin kullun kaththaba arrusula fahaqqawaAAeed

data.textUthmani: أَفَعَيِينَا بِٱلْخَلْقِ ٱلْأَوَّلِ ۚ بَلْ هُمْ فِى لَبْسٍ مِّنْ خَلْقٍ جَدِيدٍ
data.wordByWord: أَفَعَيِينَا [Were We then tired] بِٱلْخَلْقِ [with the creation] ٱلْأَوَّلِ ۚ [the first] بَلْ [Nay] هُمْ [they] فِى [(are) in] لَبْسٍۢ [doubt] مِّنْ [about] خَلْقٍۢ [a creation] جَدِيدٍۢ [new]
data.transliteration: AfaAAayeena bilkhalqial-awwali bal hum fee labsin min khalqin jadeed

data.textUthmani: وَلَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ وَنَعْلَمُ مَا تُوَسْوِسُ بِهِۦ نَفْسُهُۥ ۖ وَنَحْنُ أَقْرَبُ إِلَيْهِ مِنْ حَبْلِ ٱلْوَرِيدِ
data.wordByWord: وَلَقَدْ [And certainly] خَلَقْنَا [We created] ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ [man] وَنَعْلَمُ [and We know] مَا [what] تُوَسْوِسُ [whispers] بِهِۦ [to him] نَفْسُهُۥ ۖ [his soul] وَنَحْنُ [and We] أَقْرَبُ [(are) nearer] إِلَيْهِ [to him] مِنْ [than] حَبْلِ [(his) jugular vein] ٱلْوَرِيدِ [(his) jugular vein]
data.transliteration: Walaqad khalaqna al-insanawanaAAlamu ma tuwaswisu bihi nafsuhu wanahnu aqrabuilayhi min habli alwareed

data.textUthmani: إِذْ يَتَلَقَّى ٱلْمُتَلَقِّيَانِ عَنِ ٱلْيَمِينِ وَعَنِ ٱلشِّمَالِ قَعِيدٌ
data.wordByWord: إِذْ [When] يَتَلَقَّى [receive] ٱلْمُتَلَقِّيَانِ [the two receivers] عَنِ [on] ٱلْيَمِينِ [the right] وَعَنِ [and on] ٱلشِّمَالِ [the left] قَعِيدٌۭ [seated]
data.transliteration: Ith yatalaqqa almutalaqqiyaniAAani alyameeni waAAani ashshimali qaAAeed

data.textUthmani: مَّا يَلْفِظُ مِن قَوْلٍ إِلَّا لَدَيْهِ رَقِيبٌ عَتِيدٌ
data.wordByWord: مَّا [Not] يَلْفِظُ [he utters] مِن [any] قَوْلٍ [word] إِلَّا [but] لَدَيْهِ [with him] رَقِيبٌ [(is) an observer] عَتِيدٌۭ [ready]
data.transliteration: Ma yalfithu min qawlinilla ladayhi raqeebun AAateed

data.textUthmani: وَجَآءَتْ سَكْرَةُ ٱلْمَوْتِ بِٱلْحَقِّ ۖ ذَٰلِكَ مَا كُنتَ مِنْهُ تَحِيدُ
data.wordByWord: وَجَآءَتْ [And will come] سَكْرَةُ [(the) stupor] ٱلْمَوْتِ [(of) death] بِٱلْحَقِّ ۖ [in truth] ذَٰلِكَ [That] مَا [(is) what] كُنتَ [you were] مِنْهُ [[from it]] تَحِيدُ [avoiding]
data.transliteration: Wajaat sakratu almawti bilhaqqithalika ma kunta minhu taheed

data.textUthmani: وَنُفِخَ فِى ٱلصُّورِ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ يَوْمُ ٱلْوَعِيدِ
data.wordByWord: وَنُفِخَ [And will be blown] فِى [[in]] ٱلصُّورِ ۚ [the trumpet] ذَٰلِكَ [That] يَوْمُ [(is the) Day] ٱلْوَعِيدِ [(of) the Warning]
data.transliteration: Wanufikha fee assoori thalikayawmu alwaAAeed

data.textUthmani: وَجَآءَتْ كُلُّ نَفْسٍ مَّعَهَا سَآئِقٌ وَشَهِيدٌ
data.wordByWord: وَجَآءَتْ [And will come] كُلُّ [every] نَفْسٍۢ [soul] مَّعَهَا [with it] سَآئِقٌۭ [a driver] وَشَهِيدٌۭ [and a witness]
data.transliteration: Wajaat kullu nafsin maAAaha sa-iqunwashaheed

data.textUthmani: لَّقَدْ كُنتَ فِى غَفْلَةٍ مِّنْ هَـٰذَا فَكَشَفْنَا عَنكَ غِطَآءَكَ فَبَصَرُكَ ٱلْيَوْمَ حَدِيدٌ
data.wordByWord: لَّقَدْ [Certainly] كُنتَ [you were] فِى [in] غَفْلَةٍۢ [heedlessness] مِّنْ [of] هَـٰذَا [this] فَكَشَفْنَا [So We have removed] عَنكَ [from you] غِطَآءَكَ [your cover] فَبَصَرُكَ [so your sight] ٱلْيَوْمَ [today] حَدِيدٌۭ [(is) sharp]
data.transliteration: Laqad kunta fee ghaflatin min hathafakashafna AAanka ghitaaka fabasarukaalyawma hadeed

data.textUthmani: وَقَالَ قَرِينُهُۥ هَـٰذَا مَا لَدَىَّ عَتِيدٌ
data.wordByWord: وَقَالَ [And (will) say] قَرِينُهُۥ [his companion] هَـٰذَا [This] مَا [(is) what] لَدَىَّ [(is) with me] عَتِيدٌ [ready]
data.transliteration: Waqala qareenuhu hatha maladayya AAateed

data.textUthmani: أَلْقِيَا فِى جَهَنَّمَ كُلَّ كَفَّارٍ عَنِيدٍ
data.wordByWord: أَلْقِيَا [Throw] فِى [in (to)] جَهَنَّمَ [Hell] كُلَّ [every] كَفَّارٍ [disbeliever] عَنِيدٍۢ [stubborn]
data.transliteration: Alqiya fee jahannama kulla kaffarinAAaneed

data.textUthmani: مَّنَّاعٍ لِّلْخَيْرِ مُعْتَدٍ مُّرِيبٍ
data.wordByWord: مَّنَّاعٍۢ [Forbidder] لِّلْخَيْرِ [of good] مُعْتَدٍۢ [transgressor] مُّرِيبٍ [doubter]
data.transliteration: MannaAAin lilkhayri muAAtadin mureeb

data.textUthmani: ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَـٰهًا ءَاخَرَ فَأَلْقِيَاهُ فِى ٱلْعَذَابِ ٱلشَّدِيدِ
data.wordByWord: ٱلَّذِى [Who] جَعَلَ [made] مَعَ [with] ٱللَّهِ [Allah] إِلَـٰهًا [a god] ءَاخَرَ [another] فَأَلْقِيَاهُ [so throw him] فِى [in(to)] ٱلْعَذَابِ [the punishment] ٱلشَّدِيدِ [the severe]
data.transliteration: Allathee jaAAala maAAa Allahiilahan akhara faalqiyahu fee alAAathabiashshadeed

data.textUthmani: ۞ قَالَ قَرِينُهُۥ رَبَّنَا مَآ أَطْغَيْتُهُۥ وَلَـٰكِن كَانَ فِى ضَلَـٰلٍۭ بَعِيدٍ
data.wordByWord: ۞ قَالَ [Will say] قَرِينُهُۥ [his companion] رَبَّنَا [Our Lord] مَآ [not] أَطْغَيْتُهُۥ [I made him transgress] وَلَـٰكِن [but] كَانَ [he was] فِى [in] ضَلَـٰلٍۭ [error] بَعِيدٍۢ [far]
data.transliteration: Qala qareenuhu rabbana maatghaytuhu walakin kana fee dalalinbaAAeed

data.textUthmani: قَالَ لَا تَخْتَصِمُوا۟ لَدَىَّ وَقَدْ قَدَّمْتُ إِلَيْكُم بِٱلْوَعِيدِ
data.wordByWord: قَالَ [He will say] لَا [(Do) not] تَخْتَصِمُوا۟ [dispute] لَدَىَّ [(in) My presence] وَقَدْ [and indeed] قَدَّمْتُ [I sent forth] إِلَيْكُم [to you] بِٱلْوَعِيدِ [the Warning]
data.transliteration: Qala la takhtasimooladayya waqad qaddamtu ilaykum bilwaAAeed

data.textUthmani: مَا يُبَدَّلُ ٱلْقَوْلُ لَدَىَّ وَمَآ أَنَا۠ بِظَلَّـٰمٍ لِّلْعَبِيدِ
data.wordByWord: مَا [Not] يُبَدَّلُ [will be changed] ٱلْقَوْلُ [the word] لَدَىَّ [with Me] وَمَآ [and not] أَنَا۠ [I Am] بِظَلَّـٰمٍۢ [unjust] لِّلْعَبِيدِ [to My slaves]
data.transliteration: Ma yubaddalu alqawlu ladayya wamaana bithallamin lilAAabeed

data.textUthmani: يَوْمَ نَقُولُ لِجَهَنَّمَ هَلِ ٱمْتَلَأْتِ وَتَقُولُ هَلْ مِن مَّزِيدٍ
data.wordByWord: يَوْمَ [(The) Day] نَقُولُ [We will say] لِجَهَنَّمَ [to Hell] هَلِ [Are] ٱمْتَلَأْتِ [you filled] وَتَقُولُ [And it will say] هَلْ [Are] مِن [(there) any] مَّزِيدٍۢ [more]
data.transliteration: Yawma naqoolu lijahannama hali imtala/tiwataqoolu hal min mazeed

data.textUthmani: وَأُزْلِفَتِ ٱلْجَنَّةُ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ غَيْرَ بَعِيدٍ
data.wordByWord: وَأُزْلِفَتِ [And will be brought near] ٱلْجَنَّةُ [the Paradise] لِلْمُتَّقِينَ [to the righteous] غَيْرَ [not] بَعِيدٍ [far]
data.transliteration: Waozlifati aljannatu lilmuttaqeena ghayrabaAAeed

data.textUthmani: هَـٰذَا مَا تُوعَدُونَ لِكُلِّ أَوَّابٍ حَفِيظٍ
data.wordByWord: هَـٰذَا [This] مَا [(is) what] تُوعَدُونَ [you were promised] لِكُلِّ [for everyone] أَوَّابٍ [who turns] حَفِيظٍۢ [(and) who keeps]
data.transliteration: Hatha ma tooAAadoona likulliawwabin hafeeth

data.textUthmani: مَّنْ خَشِىَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنَ بِٱلْغَيْبِ وَجَآءَ بِقَلْبٍ مُّنِيبٍ
data.wordByWord: مَّنْ [Who] خَشِىَ [feared] ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنَ [the Most Gracious] بِٱلْغَيْبِ [in the unseen] وَجَآءَ [and came] بِقَلْبٍۢ [with a heart] مُّنِيبٍ [returning]
data.transliteration: Man khashiya arrahmanabilghaybi wajaa biqalbin muneeb

data.textUthmani: ٱدْخُلُوهَا بِسَلَـٰمٍ ۖ ذَٰلِكَ يَوْمُ ٱلْخُلُودِ
data.wordByWord: ٱدْخُلُوهَا [Enter it] بِسَلَـٰمٍۢ ۖ [in peace] ذَٰلِكَ [That] يَوْمُ [(is) a Day] ٱلْخُلُودِ [(of) Eternity]
data.transliteration: Odkhulooha bisalamin thalikayawmu alkhulood

data.textUthmani: لَهُم مَّا يَشَآءُونَ فِيهَا وَلَدَيْنَا مَزِيدٌ
data.wordByWord: لَهُم [For them] مَّا [whatever] يَشَآءُونَ [they wish] فِيهَا [therein] وَلَدَيْنَا [and with Us] مَزِيدٌۭ [(is) more]
data.transliteration: Lahum ma yashaoona feehawaladayna mazeed

data.textUthmani: وَكَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا قَبْلَهُم مِّن قَرْنٍ هُمْ أَشَدُّ مِنْهُم بَطْشًا فَنَقَّبُوا۟ فِى ٱلْبِلَـٰدِ هَلْ مِن مَّحِيصٍ
data.wordByWord: وَكَمْ [And how many] أَهْلَكْنَا [We destroyed] قَبْلَهُم [before them] مِّن [of] قَرْنٍ [a generation] هُمْ [they] أَشَدُّ [(were) stronger] مِنْهُم [than them] بَطْشًۭا [(in) power] فَنَقَّبُوا۟ [so they explored] فِى [throughout] ٱلْبِلَـٰدِ [the lands] هَلْ [Is (there)] مِن [any] مَّحِيصٍ [place of escape]
data.transliteration: Wakam ahlakna qablahum min qarnin humashaddu minhum batshan fanaqqaboo fee albiladi halmin mahees

data.textUthmani: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَذِكْرَىٰ لِمَن كَانَ لَهُۥ قَلْبٌ أَوْ أَلْقَى ٱلسَّمْعَ وَهُوَ شَهِيدٌ
data.wordByWord: إِنَّ [Indeed] فِى [in] ذَٰلِكَ [that] لَذِكْرَىٰ [surely, is a reminder] لِمَن [for (one) who] كَانَ [is ] لَهُۥ [for him] قَلْبٌ [a heart] أَوْ [or] أَلْقَى [(who) gives ear] ٱلسَّمْعَ [(who) gives ear] وَهُوَ [while he] شَهِيدٌۭ [(is) a witness]
data.transliteration: Inna fee thalika lathikraliman kana lahu qalbun aw alqa assamAAawahuwa shaheed

data.textUthmani: وَلَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا فِى سِتَّةِ أَيَّامٍ وَمَا مَسَّنَا مِن لُّغُوبٍ
data.wordByWord: وَلَقَدْ [And certainly] خَلَقْنَا [We created] ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ [the heavens] وَٱلْأَرْضَ [and the earth] وَمَا [and whatever] بَيْنَهُمَا [(is) between both of them] فِى [in] سِتَّةِ [six] أَيَّامٍۢ [periods] وَمَا [and (did) not] مَسَّنَا [touch Us] مِن [any] لُّغُوبٍۢ [fatigue]
data.transliteration: Walaqad khalaqna assamawatiwal-arda wama baynahuma fee sittatiayyamin wama massana min lughoob

data.textUthmani: فَٱصْبِرْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ قَبْلَ طُلُوعِ ٱلشَّمْسِ وَقَبْلَ ٱلْغُرُوبِ
data.wordByWord: فَٱصْبِرْ [So be patient] عَلَىٰ [over] مَا [what] يَقُولُونَ [they say] وَسَبِّحْ [and glorify] بِحَمْدِ [(the) praise] رَبِّكَ [(of) your Lord] قَبْلَ [before] طُلُوعِ [(the) rising] ٱلشَّمْسِ [(of) the sun] وَقَبْلَ [and before] ٱلْغُرُوبِ [the setting]
data.transliteration: Fasbir AAala mayaqooloona wasabbih bihamdi rabbika qabla tulooAAiashshamsi waqabla alghuroob

data.textUthmani: وَمِنَ ٱلَّيْلِ فَسَبِّحْهُ وَأَدْبَـٰرَ ٱلسُّجُودِ
data.wordByWord: وَمِنَ [And of] ٱلَّيْلِ [the night] فَسَبِّحْهُ [glorify Him] وَأَدْبَـٰرَ [and after] ٱلسُّجُودِ [the prostration]
data.transliteration: Wamina allayli fasabbihhu waadbaraassujood

data.textUthmani: وَٱسْتَمِعْ يَوْمَ يُنَادِ ٱلْمُنَادِ مِن مَّكَانٍ قَرِيبٍ
data.wordByWord: وَٱسْتَمِعْ [And listen] يَوْمَ [(The) Day] يُنَادِ [will call] ٱلْمُنَادِ [the caller] مِن [from] مَّكَانٍۢ [a place] قَرِيبٍۢ [near]
data.transliteration: WastamiAA yawma yunadi almunadimin makanin qareeb

data.textUthmani: يَوْمَ يَسْمَعُونَ ٱلصَّيْحَةَ بِٱلْحَقِّ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ يَوْمُ ٱلْخُرُوجِ
data.wordByWord: يَوْمَ [(The) Day] يَسْمَعُونَ [they will hear] ٱلصَّيْحَةَ [the Blast] بِٱلْحَقِّ ۚ [in truth] ذَٰلِكَ [That] يَوْمُ [(is the) Day] ٱلْخُرُوجِ [(of) coming forth]
data.transliteration: Yawma yasmaAAoona assayhatabilhaqqi thalika yawmu alkhurooj

data.textUthmani: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نُحْىِۦ وَنُمِيتُ وَإِلَيْنَا ٱلْمَصِيرُ
data.wordByWord: إِنَّا [Indeed, We] نَحْنُ [[We]] نُحْىِۦ [[We] give life] وَنُمِيتُ [and [We] cause death] وَإِلَيْنَا [and to Us] ٱلْمَصِيرُ [(is) the final return]
data.transliteration: Inna nahnu nuhyeewanumeetu wa-ilayna almaseer

data.textUthmani: يَوْمَ تَشَقَّقُ ٱلْأَرْضُ عَنْهُمْ سِرَاعًا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ حَشْرٌ عَلَيْنَا يَسِيرٌ
data.wordByWord: يَوْمَ [(The) Day] تَشَقَّقُ [will split] ٱلْأَرْضُ [the earth] عَنْهُمْ [from them] سِرَاعًۭا ۚ [hurrying] ذَٰلِكَ [That] حَشْرٌ [(is) a gathering] عَلَيْنَا [for Us] يَسِيرٌۭ [easy]
data.transliteration: Yawma tashaqqaqu al-ardu AAanhum siraAAanthalika hashrun AAalayna yaseer

data.textUthmani: نَّحْنُ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا يَقُولُونَ ۖ وَمَآ أَنتَ عَلَيْهِم بِجَبَّارٍ ۖ فَذَكِّرْ بِٱلْقُرْءَانِ مَن يَخَافُ وَعِيدِ
data.wordByWord: نَّحْنُ [We] أَعْلَمُ [know best] بِمَا [[of] what] يَقُولُونَ ۖ [they say] وَمَآ [and not] أَنتَ [(are) you] عَلَيْهِم [over them] بِجَبَّارٍۢ ۖ [the one to compel] فَذَكِّرْ [But remind] بِٱلْقُرْءَانِ [with the Quran] مَن [whoever] يَخَافُ [fears] وَعِيدِ [My threat]
data.transliteration: Nahnu aAAlamu bima yaqooloonawama anta AAalayhim bijabbarin fathakkir bilqur-animan yakhafu waAAeed
